document_data.name: ''Indomitable Gloves''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Indomitable gloves''''' were [[enchanted]] items that bolstered the wearer's defenses. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''gloves'' granted the wearer an uncanny ability to block attacks and defend themselves. The wearer could reliable halve the number of injuries they might have otherwise accrued in a battle.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Raika]], a [[barbarian]] [[adventurer]], possessed a pair of ''indomitable gloves''.
